name: FIRST SOVIET SPOTIFY
description:
First Soviet Spotify — a game about the official appointed by the First Soviet Spotify. Your task as an official is to maintain the Leader’s mood in good condition. You must take into account the wishes of Comrade Stalin and turn on the radio wave that suits his needs.

By moving the arrows left and right, you can switch between different radio waves. For your benefit, only one transmission is assigned to each wave. Once you find what Comrade Stalin would like to listen to now, you can relax for a while.

But do not allow yourself to neglect! Make sure that the mood of Comrade Stalin does not fall at all and quickly respond to the wishes of the Leader. Remember that instead of the First Soviet Spotify, the Second Soviet Spotify can immediately come.
